TextView.android:text:
1. Create a Google spreadsheet
2. In the first row, define column names for task description, deadline, status and comments [Tip: freeze the first row!]
3. In the app settings, set it as the source in the GSTasklist settings and specify the column names

Every time you add/edit/delete a task, the changes are only applied locally (you will see a small 'upload' icon).
'Upload changes' to apply the changes in made with the app to the Google spreadsheet.
'Reload tasklist' to overwrite tasks in the app with the ones in the Google spreadsheet.
